TABLE.NAME: booking
TABLE.COMMENT: Available bookings are stored here

FIELD.NAME: mailtemplatessource
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 = Instance specific mail templates / 1 = Global mail templates from plugin config

FIELD.NAME: autoenrol
FIELD.COMMENT: Automatically enrol / unenrol users to/from courses as soon as booking are made / cancelled

FIELD.NAME: bookedtext
FIELD.COMMENT: The content of the email to send to the users when a successful booking is made

FIELD.NAME: waitingtext
FIELD.COMMENT: The content of the email to send to the users when a booking has been added to the waiting list

FIELD.NAME: statuschangetext
FIELD.COMMENT: The content of the email to send to the users when a booking status has changed

FIELD.NAME: deletedtext
FIELD.COMMENT: The content of the email to send to the users when a booking has been cancelled

FIELD.NAME: bookingchangedtext
FIELD.COMMENT: Message text to be sent to booked users when a booking option (or session) has been changed.

FIELD.NAME: maxperuser
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum number of bookings that each user can make (reset when an event passes)

FIELD.NAME: sendmailtobooker
FIELD.COMMENT: Send mails to booker instead to booked users

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Duration - info field.

FIELD.NAME: points
FIELD.COMMENT: Points, get from this course.

FIELD.NAME: organizatorname
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of organizator - for sending emails.

FIELD.NAME: pollurl
FIELD.COMMENT: Url to send in email - poll for evaluation.

FIELD.NAME: enablecompletion
FIELD.COMMENT: For activity completion API!

FIELD.NAME: cancancelbook
FIELD.COMMENT: Can cancel or book when the seminar is started?

FIELD.NAME: daystonotifyteachers
FIELD.COMMENT: Days in advance to send notification mail to teachers.

FIELD.NAME: notifyemailteachers
FIELD.COMMENT: Content of the notification mail sent to teachers.

FIELD.NAME: whichview
FIELD.COMMENT: Which view is default.

FIELD.NAME: removeuseronunenrol
FIELD.COMMENT: Remove user from booking, when it's unenrooled from course.

FIELD.NAME: allowupdatedays
FIELD.COMMENT: How many days before closing unenrolment.

FIELD.NAME: showlistoncoursepage
FIELD.COMMENT: Setting that specifies if a list of available booking options should be shown on the coursepage.

FIELD.NAME: showviews
FIELD.COMMENT: Which views are shown in view.php

FIELD.NAME: autcractive
FIELD.COMMENT: Active auto create option feature.

FIELD.NAME: autcrprofile
FIELD.COMMENT: Auto create user profile field to check.

FIELD.NAME: autcrvalue
FIELD.COMMENT: Auto create user profile field value to check.

FIELD.NAME: autcrtemplate
FIELD.COMMENT: Template to create an option from auto create option.

FIELD.NAME: semesterid
FIELD.COMMENT: Semester ID

FIELD.NAME: iselective
FIELD.COMMENT: Elective feature.

FIELD.NAME: consumeatonce
FIELD.COMMENT: Elective feature.

FIELD.NAME: maxcredits
FIELD.COMMENT: Elective feature.

FIELD.NAME: enforceorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Elective feature.

FIELD.NAME: enforceteacherorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Elective feature.

FIELD.NAME: json
FIELD.COMMENT: This allows to add supplementary information which is not performance critical, e.g. disablecancel

INDEX.NAME: templateid
INDEX.COMMENT: The templateid used as default for options.

TABLE.NAME: booking_options
TABLE.COMMENT: Defines booking options

FIELD.NAME: enrolmentstatus
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 enrol at coursestart; 1 enrolment done; 2 immediately enrol

FIELD.NAME: addtocalendar
FIELD.COMMENT: Add event_option to calendar.

FIELD.NAME: calendarid
FIELD.COMMENT: Calendar event id.

FIELD.NAME: sentteachers
FIELD.COMMENT: Set to 1 if teacher notifications have been sent, else 0.

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: Duration - information.

FIELD.NAME: parentid
FIELD.COMMENT: Parent id of booking option - only for recurring.

FIELD.NAME: semesterid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of an associated semester.

FIELD.NAME: dayofweektime
FIELD.COMMENT: String for reoccurring date series, e.g. 'FR 11:00-12:00'

FIELD.NAME: invisible
FIELD.COMMENT: If set to 0 (default), it's visible to everyone. If set to 1, it's visible to entitled users only.

FIELD.NAME: timemadevisible
FIELD.COMMENT: Last time when the booking option was made visible.

FIELD.NAME: identifier
FIELD.COMMENT: Unique identifier of the booking option.

FIELD.NAME: titleprefix
FIELD.COMMENT: Prefix to be shown before the title of the booking option.

FIELD.NAME: priceformulaoff
FIELD.COMMENT: If set to 1, the prices of this booking option will never be calculated with the price formula.

FIELD.NAME: dayofweek
FIELD.COMMENT: String for reoccurring date series, like 'Friday'.

FIELD.NAME: availability
FIELD.COMMENT: Availability restrictions for viewing this booking option, in JSON format. Null if no restrictions.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: If set to 0 - Status is not canceled. 1 - Status is canceld but visible

FIELD.NAME: credits
FIELD.COMMENT: Elective feature.

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Elective feature.

FIELD.NAME: json
FIELD.COMMENT: This allows to add supplementary information which is not performance sensible like after booking actions etc.

FIELD.NAME: sqlfilter
FIELD.COMMENT: This is a marker to show if the availability json in this specific option needs to be parsed to filter. 0 means no, 1 means yes.

FIELD.NAME: competencies
FIELD.COMMENT: ids of competencies acquired with completing this booking option

TABLE.NAME: booking_answers
TABLE.COMMENT: bookings performed by users

FIELD.NAME: waitinglist
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 = regular 1 = on waitinglist

FIELD.NAME: places
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of places taken by this booking answer.

FIELD.NAME: json
FIELD.COMMENT: Supplementary information on this booking option json encoded for max flexibility.

TABLE.NAME: booking_teachers
TABLE.COMMENT: Teachers added to a booking option. Can manage bookings of that booking option

TABLE.NAME: booking_tags
TABLE.COMMENT: Tags used for bookings

TABLE.NAME: booking_other
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: booking_optiondates
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: eventid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the corresponding calendar event.

FIELD.NAME: daystonotify
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of days in advance to send an e-mail notification to all booked users.

FIELD.NAME: sent
FIELD.COMMENT: If sent is 1, then an e-mail notification has already been sent for this optiondate.

FIELD.NAME: reason
FIELD.COMMENT: The reason why a teacher was missing or substituted by someone.

FIELD.NAME: reviewed
FIELD.COMMENT: Substitution or cancellation of optiondate has been reviewed.

TABLE.NAME: booking_optiondates_teachers
TABLE.COMMENT: Track teachers for each session.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid of the teacher.

TABLE.NAME: booking_customfields
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: optiondateid
FIELD.COMMENT: Links a custom field to an individual option date in booking_optiondates table.

TABLE.NAME: booking_ratings
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: booking_instancetemplate
TABLE.COMMENT: Table, where booking instance templates are stored.

TABLE.NAME: booking_customreport
TABLE.COMMENT: Table, where custom reports are stored.

TABLE.NAME: booking_icalsequence
TABLE.COMMENT: Keep track of sequence values for ical generation

TABLE.NAME: booking_userevents
TABLE.COMMENT: Keep track of user events in calendar

TABLE.NAME: booking_prices
TABLE.COMMENT: Set the price of a booking option

TABLE.NAME: booking_pricecategories
TABLE.COMMENT: Different price categories for different types of users (e.g. students, academics, employees, externals...)

FIELD.NAME: ordernum
FIELD.COMMENT: A number defining the sort order of the categories.

FIELD.NAME: identifier
FIELD.COMMENT: The identifier of the price category, e.g. 'student'.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The full name of the price category, e.g. 'Student price'.

FIELD.NAME: defaultvalue
FIELD.COMMENT: A default value for every price in this category.

FIELD.NAME: pricecatsortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Sorting order to be used when more than one price category is shown.

FIELD.NAME: disabled
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 = active, 1 = price category has been disabled

TABLE.NAME: booking_semesters
TABLE.COMMENT: Semesters are time periods with a defined start and end date.

FIELD.NAME: identifier
FIELD.COMMENT: The identifier of the semester, e.g. 'WS21'.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The full name of the semester, e.g. 'Winter semester 2021/2022'.

TABLE.NAME: booking_holidays
TABLE.COMMENT: Time periods within a semester where no booking options should be created.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the holiday, e.g. 'Christmas'.

TABLE.NAME: booking_campaigns
TABLE.COMMENT: Booking campaigns for a specific time period.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the campaign

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Campaign type

FIELD.NAME: json
FIELD.COMMENT: Campaign conditions as JSON.

FIELD.NAME: starttime
FIELD.COMMENT: Campaign start time as unix timestamp.

FIELD.NAME: endtime
FIELD.COMMENT: End time of the campaign as unix timestamp.

FIELD.NAME: limitfactor
FIELD.COMMENT: Value to multiply booking limit with.

FIELD.NAME: extendlimitforoverbooked
FIELD.COMMENT: Setting to see if the booking limit should take into overbookings into account.

TABLE.NAME: booking_rules
TABLE.COMMENT: Set of different rules defined with JSON.

FIELD.NAME: contextid
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the contextid. 1 means that this rule applies globally.

FIELD.NAME: rulename
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the rule

FIELD.NAME: rulejson
FIELD.COMMENT: JSON defining the rule.

FIELD.NAME: eventname
FIELD.COMMENT: For eventbased rules, for faster execution

FIELD.NAME: useastemplate
FIELD.COMMENT: The value 1 means that this rule is a template.

FIELD.NAME: isactive
FIELD.COMMENT: Only active rules will be applied.

TABLE.NAME: booking_subbooking_options
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the configured subbookings for individual booking options.

FIELD.NAME: optionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the bookingoption to which this subbooking is connected.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Individual name of the subbooking

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of the subbooking. Has to correspond to the class name in the subbookings folder.

FIELD.NAME: json
FIELD.COMMENT: The json which stores settings corresponding to the configuration of the individual subbooking.

FIELD.NAME: block
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 blocks the booking of the corresponding booking option. This makes sense for timeslot bookings eg.

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the user who modified this subbooking

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time created.

TABLE.NAME: booking_subbooking_answers
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the anwers (the bookings) of a user for a particular subbooking.

FIELD.NAME: itemid
FIELD.COMMENT: itemid can be the same as sboptionid, but there are some types (eg. timeslots which provide slots) where one sboptionid provides a lot of itemids.

FIELD.NAME: sboptionid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the booked subbooking

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Userid of the booked user.

FIELD.NAME: json
FIELD.COMMENT: supplementary data if necessary

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp for start time of this booking

FIELD.NAME: timeend
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp for end time of this booking

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The bookings status, as in booked, waiting list, in the shopping cart, on a notify list or deleted

TABLE.NAME: booking_combinations
TABLE.COMMENT: Booking option can define necessary or forbidden combination with other booking option

FIELD.NAME: optionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Which booking option is concerned

FIELD.NAME: otheroptionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The OTHER booking option, with which a relation is defined here

FIELD.NAME: othercourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Instead of a booking option, we can also define a relation to a course (must be booked, finished etc.)

FIELD.NAME: cancombine
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 is can't combine, 1 is must combine, 3 is must not be finished, 4 is must be finished

TABLE.NAME: booking_odt_deductions
TABLE.COMMENT: This table is used to log if we want to deduct a part of a teachers salary if (s)he has missing hours.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Userid of the teacher who gets a deduction for this option date.

FIELD.NAME: reason
FIELD.COMMENT: Reason for the deduction.

TABLE.NAME: booking_form_config
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to save optionform configuration for different capabilities and contexts.

FIELD.NAME: area
FIELD.COMMENT: Area is basically the difference between instance and option.

FIELD.NAME: json
FIELD.COMMENT: The ids of the option fields and their order is saved here.

TABLE.NAME: booking_enrollink_bundles
TABLE.COMMENT: A bundle of places (multiple or single) for a given course to be enroled into.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: course to be enrolled to

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: user who ordered the bundle

FIELD.NAME: places
FIELD.COMMENT: total amount of places of this bundle (seats in course)

FIELD.NAME: erlid
FIELD.COMMENT: hash value to double check the matching with the items from the bundle

FIELD.NAME: baid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of bookinganswer with which the bundle was created

TABLE.NAME: booking_enrollink_items
TABLE.COMMENT: The items (places/seats in courses) that can be acquired in a bundle

FIELD.NAME: erlid
FIELD.COMMENT: hash of the bundle this item is referring to

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the user who bought this item

FIELD.NAME: consumed
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 still open, 1 consumed

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp when this item was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: timestamp of update (like cancellation)

TABLE.NAME: booking_optiondates_answers
TABLE.COMMENT: This manages presence status for users for optiondates (sessions)

TABLE.NAME: booking_history
TABLE.COMMENT: Logging the history of user interactions like booking, cancelling etc.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: possible status defined in lib.php like: MOD_BOOKING_STATUSPARAM_XYZ

FIELD.NAME: json
FIELD.COMMENT: additional data
